concept.title: Serializable Types
concept.shortdesc: All of the build-in generics are automatically registered at initialization.

conbody.p: If your application uses more complex key types that you want to make more accessible or easier to handle, you can derive a new class from IGFSerializable. Another option is for the application to do its own object serialization using Byte[] or a custom type.
conbody.note: The GemFire IGFSerializable interface does not support object graphs with multiple references to the same object. If your application uses these types of circular graphs, you must address this design concern explicitly.
